patterns: What role am I applying for?
Can you describe the job position?
responses: The position is for a [Job Title] at our company.
You are applying for the [Job Title] role.

patterns: What is the interview process like?
Can you explain the interview steps?
How many rounds of interviews are there?
responses: The interview process consists of three rounds: an initial phone screen, a technical interview, and a final interview with the team.
We have a three-step interview process: phone interview, technical round, and team interview.

patterns: What is the salary for this position?
responses: The salary for this role is competitive and depends on experience.
We offer health insurance, retirement plans, and other benefits.

patterns: What is the work culture like?
Can you describe the work environment?
responses: We have a collaborative and inclusive work environment where everyone is encouraged to contribute ideas.
Our team culture is supportive, with a focus on personal and professional growth.

patterns: How should I prepare for the interview?
What should I bring to the interview?
Do you have any tips for the interview?
responses: We recommend researching the company and the role, and bringing a copy of your resume and any relevant work samples.
Be prepared to talk about your experience and how it relates to the role. We also suggest practicing common interview questions.

patterns: How will I know if I am selected?
When will I hear back about the interview?
Can I get feedback on my interview?
responses: We will contact you within a week with the outcome of the interview.
We typically provide feedback after the interview process is complete.
